channel.title: How do you make wepons for premiums only?

item.title: How do you make wepons for premiums only?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Gold Lord Gold
item.description:
@Lord_Gold wrote:

This is what i was thinking but i might be wrong

} else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") && premium) { || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 70; } return 1; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make wepons for premiums only?
